channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6138] FW: wrong text on the web page
item.description:
From: Camisa, Paolo
Sent: Donnerstag, 8. Januar 2015 15:31
To: Ilie, Oana
Subject: wrong text on the web page

 

Hi Oana ,

 

After the latest deployment of the web layout some translations  became wrong .

 

 

 

The right text is Svuota Carrello

 

 

 

 

 

Below other mistakes

 

 

 

Ma anche ???

 

 

ANCHE ..????

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Camisa Paolo
Inside Sales Manager
_________________________________________________________________

 

Distrelec Italia S.r.l.
Unit of Datwyler Switzerland Inc.
Via Canova 46/50

20020 Lainate / Italy

T +39 02 937 55 776

F +39 02 937 55 755

[1]paolo.camisa@distrelec.com
[2]www.distrelec.com

 

_________________________________________________________________
This e-mail, including attachments, is intended only for the person(s) or company to whom it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or legally privileged information. Unauthorized storage, disclosure, copying, use, modification, distribution and/or publication of this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient may be unlawful and is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete this message and notify the sender immediately
_________________________________________________________________

 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] paolo.camisa@distrelec.com
[2] http://www.distrelec.com/
item.summary: FW: wrong text on the web page

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi Oana,
Could you please provide me the translation text?.

Hi Surendra

the text was correct before the last deployment in P.

shouldn't the correct text be found in the last version?

Hi Oana,

Ok. I will check it out. In case, if it is there in the repository, i will use that one.

Hi Oana,
Please provide me a translation text please. There was no transltation file exists for IT from beginning of the deployment.
please give me the IDs of these keys.

1. Distrelec Cart Page ######
              UPDATE CMSParagraphComponent;$contentCV[unique=true];uid[unique=true];content[lang=$lang]
              ;;EmptyCartParagraphComponent;<h2>Ihr Einkaufskorb ist leer</h2><p>Vorschläge</p><ul><li>Wählen Sie die Produkte über die Kategorien oben aus</li></ul>;

1. CMS Headline Component
    UPDATE DistHeadlineComponent;$contentCV[unique=true];uid[unique=true];headline[lang=$lang]
    ;;OrderConfirmationHeadlineComponent;Vielen Dank dass Sie bei Distrelec einkaufen!
    ;;OrderConfirmationPickupHeadlineComponent;Vielen Dank dass Sie bei Distrelec einkaufen!
    ;;OrderConfirmationApprovalHeadlineComponent;Ihre Bestellung wurde zu Ihrem Administrator weitergeleitet!

UPDATE DistProductFFCarouselComponent;$contentCV[unique=true];uid[unique=true];title[lang=$lang]
;;RecommendationProductFFComponent;Produkt Empfehlungen;
;;AlsoBoughtProductFFComponent;Kunden, die diesen Artikel gekauft haben, kauften auch;

Distrelec Cart Page ######
UPDATE CMSParagraphComponent;$contentCV[unique=true];uid[unique=true];content[lang=$lang]
;;EmptyCartParagraphComponent;<h2>Il tuo carrello è vuoto</h2><p>Suggerimenti:</p><ul><li>Sfoglia i nostri prodotti selezionando una categoria sopra</li></ul>;

CMS Headline Component
UPDATE DistHeadlineComponent;$contentCV[unique=true];uid[unique=true];headline[lang=$lang]
;;OrderConfirmationHeadlineComponent;Grazie per aver ordinato da Distrelec !
;;OrderConfirmationPickupHeadlineComponent;Grazie per aver ordinato da Distrelec !
;;OrderConfirmationApprovalHeadlineComponent;Il tuo ordine è stato inoltrato al vostro amministratore !

UPDATE DistProductFFCarouselComponent;$contentCV[unique=true];uid[unique=true];title[lang=$lang]
;;RecommendationProductFFComponent; Prodotti consigliati ;
;;AlsoBoughtProductFFComponent;Le persone che hanno acquistato questi prodotti , hanno comprato anche;
Please review.
changes not visible in Q
Please review in next version.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6363] DK Q // Registration B2B - VAT NR. should be 8 digits
item.description:
please set-up validation for Organisational Number (or VAT NUmber). It needs to be 8 digits.

please also update the validation message.
item.summary: DK Q // Registration B2B - VAT NR. should be 8 digits

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The validation logic has been updated

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6349] SE Q // Key correction: VAT Info Bubble - B2B Registration form (SE-SE: SE-EN)
item.description:
SE Key:

1.       14 is correct. Please correct

2.       Please add to the text: ‘SE+12 siffror’

 

EN Key

1.       14 is correct. Please insert

2.       Please add to the text: ‘SE+12 digits’
item.summary: SE Q // Key correction: VAT Info Bubble - B2B Registration form (SE-SE: SE-EN)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks
please change again

1. 12 is correct. Please correct
2. Please DELETE the text: ‘SE+12 siffror’

EN Key
1. 12 is correct. Please insert
2. Please DELETE the text: ‘SE+12 digits’
Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6343] Switch position of search and category selection field
item.description: As discussed, please try to switch the position of the search box and the category selection field, so that the search is first and the selection after.
item.summary: Switch position of search and category selection field

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Nando

Could you please check with Petra how much effort this will take.
We should check it first on the D system.

Florian,
the effort would be about 1h.

Hi Florian

As announced, please see attached Screenshots and let me know, if it's ok for you.

BR & thank you
Petra

Hi Petra,
Approved.
Please implement it like this.
Thank you.
fixed on branch v3.2

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6287] SE Q// Customer Registration B2B - Length of VAT number wrongly set-up
item.description:
B2B registration form says that 11 characters are the correct configuration for B2B Sweden

This is NOT correct.

Correct is: SE+12 CHARACTHERS
item.summary: SE Q// Customer Registration B2B - Length of VAT number wrongly set-up

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Fix has been applied! Can be test after next release.
The massage has been corrected now.

Hi Neeraj

the VAT for SE should be 12 digits.

No SE in front.

please change again.

sorry

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6097] ALL-OCI Customer feedback- or other forms
item.description:
Hello,

OCI User are able to fill forms that are only contected with the username. But OCI Users are many users. Please change the forms or deativate it for OCI Users because sales can not see what customer sent the form

e.g:

Von: FM DE SCH Anfrage
Gesendet: Montag, 5. Januar 2015 08:12
An: Merter, Zisan
Betreff: WG: Distrelec Preis- und Mengenanfrage

Von: Distrelec OCI User bayer-de-ger@oci.distrelec
Gesendet: Freitag, 2. Januar 2015 14:26
An: FM DE SCH Anfrage
Betreff: Distrelec Preis- und Mengenanfrage

Article Number: 11040918
Product Name: Hautschutzsalbe
Manufacturer: Stockhausen
Quantity: 100
Customer: Distrelec OCI User (bayer-de-ger@oci.distrelec)
Comment: -
item.summary: ALL-OCI Customer feedback- or other forms

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Could you please add the exact URL's to the forms you would like to hide?
see picture, i think it is only this form

Hi Ruben,
Please add only for E-procurement customers (Ariba/OCI) more mandatory fields to the quotation form.
Please add the fields below the quantity/price line and above the message field:

  • Company
  • Firstname
  • Lastname
  • Phone

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks
Please test on Q.
This form is Ok, but found another form, that makes no sense. See picture screenshot-2
please assing to Zisan Merter

HI Zisan
Please let us know on which forms you want to have more information for OCI customers.
We have also the "quotation form" as you can see on the screenshot of Oliver and Zero Search Result page.

Hi Florian,
we have the "quotation form" for large quantities, the Zero result page and the Request for Quotation for Service Plus (CatalogPlus) items as you can see on the attached new screenshot.
For all of them we need the mandatory fields:

  • Company
  • Firstname
  • Lastname
  • Phone
  • E-Mail Adress
    Thank you!!

Fields for OCI/Ariba added in:

  • Quotation Form
  • Zero Result Page
  • Quotation Form for Service Plus (CatalogPlus)

Please re-test
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5968] DE // First shipping method
item.description:
Hi,
Christian Lelonek wants the first shipping method in cart to be Express, not economy, when the customer is not logged in.
The second thing is that economy is in double brackets, the spelling is not really correct.
See attached screenshot

Specification

  • BE: The default shipping method should be Express for germany(B2B).
  • FE: Remove the outter brackets, it should look like this: "Economy (Lieferung in 3-5 Tagen)"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: FE changes done.

Hi Zisan Merter,

At the moment in DE webshop we have only two shipping method.
1. Economy (Lieferung in 3–5 Tagen)
2. Standard (Lieferung in 1–2 Tagen)

Economy is default selected for not logged in customer which I understood you want to change . But there is no as such Express shipping method, please refer the attached screenshot and confirm that you want to if you mean to change it to Standard or Express is altogether another new shipping method ?

thanks

Hi Zisan

I think you want change the naming of Standard to Express right?

Hi Florian, Hi Neeraj,
i attach a screenshot with the right spelling.. It has to be:
"Express
Lieferung in 1-2 Tagen 6,95€"
Got it. Thanks Zisan, we'll fix it.
perfect
We are waiting for progress on http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-6075 from SAP team
Ready for testing in test env

Hi Neeraj,
see attachment, we need a blank character between Versand and Express..

Hi Ruben,

This is a front-end change can you fix the above comment from Zisan.

Hi Zisan
Please test on Q.
Hi Florian, the defaulted shipping method is ok. But as i said on 16th January: we need a blank character between Versand and Express.

Hi Ruben,
Can you please add a spce between the two words on the last screenshot?
Thx

Hi Zisan,
please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6175] Preface fix for CZ,HU,RO,SK
item.description:
Please fix the wrong telephone-prefaces. See screenshot.

Requirement:

  • CZ: +420
  • HU: +36
  • RO: +40
  • SK: +421

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment: Please estimate, thx.
please review
Please test on Q.
Hi Surendra, please add the preface as well to the FAX-fields of the countries, thx.
Please review
Hi Surendra, on Q still "41" is entered in the fax-field for HU, RO, CZ, SK.
